name: Beyond Eden
description: Beyond Eden is a Boy's love visual novel set in the Victorian era, centering on the themes of love-hate and revenge. As protagonist Alex, the player may proceed to destroy an aristocratic family while pursuing complex relationships with 6 different male characters. Does the fall await beyond Eden?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP+ Processor: 1.66 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1600 MB available space
